title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 §§ 154-1.19 - Accident reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 §§ 154-1.19 - Accident reporting

State Regulations

Whenever a vehicle or combination of vehicles operating
under a special hauling permit is involved in an accident reportable under
section
605
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, a copy of the report filed with the Commissioner
of Motor Vehicles shall be submitted to the permit agent within agent within 10
days of such accident. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
§§
154-1.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
